== Introduction ==
The old DesktopSharing page will be deleted as soon as the development of the new DesktopSharing module is completed

== Converting Images to Flash Video ==
For this task we are using [http://www.xuggle.com/xuggler/ Xuggler], which is a Java ffmpeg wrapper. The client java applet sends images to the server, where they are encoded into flash video. To get a better understanding of how this is done, see my [http://wiki.xuggle.com/Encoding_Video_from_a_sequence_of_Images tutorial], and for sample source code see the [http://flexingineer.blogspot.com/ blog]
